titleStmt.title: The lamentation of Mary Butcher, now confined in Worcester-City-Goal, on suspicion of murdering her male bastard child, in April last.
titleStmt.author: Butcher, Mary, confined in Worcester-City-gaol.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
First line: "Ye blooming maids I pray give ear."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
